thread.title: Perfect for short breaks in Paris
thread.title_full: Perfect for short breaks in Paris - Review of La Manufacture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ZicoMukh
title: Perfect for short breaks in Paris
text: This lovely little hotel is very close to Place d'Italie (2 minutes walk) and therefore quick to get to from major stations like Gare du Nord and Austerlitz. The rooms are on the smaller size, but very clean with nice furnishings. The staff are exceptionally helpful and friendly, with smooth check-in and check-out. There is a basic but perfectly serviceable breakfast. The Latin Quarter is a 5 minute walk away, and we also walked all around the 5th, 6th, and 4th. We would definitely recommend this place for couples on short Paris breaks.
